abstracts.cdata!:
The Loan would support the
            Government's reform program in the energy sector and
            assist in the implementation of the Government's core
            energy investment program for the period FY86-87. The reform
            program consists of a number of significant improvements in
            the areas of: (a) development and investment; (b) pricing
            and demand management; and (c) institutional development.
            The Loan would finance imports of equipment and material
            required by priority projects included in the core
            investment program, as well as for the efficient operation
            of existing facilities.
